alert.note: Alert for Karnes; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 8:24PM CDT until May 15 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cibolo Creek Near Falls City affecting Karnes County. San Antonio River Near Elmendorf affecting Wilson and Bexar Counties. San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge affecting Karnes and Goliad Counties. San Antonio River near Floresville affecting Karnes and Wilson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River near Floresville. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to late Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to 27.2 feet late tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening to 15.0 feet late Tuesday morning. It will rise to 15.7 feet late Wednesday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.0 feet on 07/08/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue San Antonio River Floresville 27.0 10.4 Sat 8 pm CDT 27.2 19.4 15.5 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 815 AM CDT.
